§ 5303. Grants to States, units of general local government and Indian tribes; authorizations The Secretary is authorized to make grants to States, units of general local government, and Indian tribes to carry out activities in accordance with the provisions of this chapter. For purposes of assistance under section 5306 of this title, there are authorized to be appropriated $4,000,000,000 for fiscal year 1993 and $4,168,000,000 for fiscal year 1994. Sums authorized pursuant to this section shall remain available until expended. (Pub. L. 93–383, title I, § 103, Aug. 22, 1974, 88 Stat. 637; Pub.
